column3: I can't figure out how to commit through CommitChangeListDialog without actual changes, so without changes I show my window for commit message and then perform commit. If there are changes, I invoke CommonCheckinProjectAction

I've implemented this feature in a little different way. Now you have an ability to  call the commit dialog and perform commit&close branch action from status bar ->  branches widget. Please see appropriate commit ae92a76. Thank you for your contribution.

@NadyaZabrodina, in this way there are no possibility to close branch and "commit and push", that's why  i make "close branch" kind of commit property and not the action. Anyway, your implementation is fine for me as i not really often use "commit and push". Thanks!
hg4idea: close branch option in commit dialog
